list.problem: E-commerce businesses spend a lot of time processing orders and communicating with clients. No chat memory, orders are recorded manually.
list.solutionText:
Created an AI e-commerce agent:

‚úÖ Communicates with clients as an assistant (products, availability, support)
‚úÖ Remembers all conversations (memory)
‚úÖ Takes orders right in the chat
‚úÖ Automatically saves orders and logs in Supabase
‚úÖ Sends notifications to Telegram in real time

üîß Stack: n8n + GPT + Supabase + Telegram Bot
list.result: Auto-processing of orders without a manager. Full chat history for analytics and improvements.
list.resultDesc: Order time reduced from 5 minutes to 20 seconds.

list.problem: Realtors lose clients due to slow lead processing from the site. Data comes with errors, no validation, and no instant notifications.
list.solutionText:
Built Real Estate Lead Automation:

‚úÖ Form validation (name, phone, email)
‚úÖ Data cleaning and normalization
‚úÖ Instant lead sent to Telegram with a 'Call' button
‚úÖ All implemented via n8n workflow + Telegram Bot API
list.result: Leads arrive 1-2 seconds after form submission. Realtors call the client immediately without delay.
list.resultDesc: Conversion increased without hiring new managers.

list.problem: Many businesses lose leads due to manual transfer from forms to CRM. Data is lost, no fast notifications.
list.solutionText:
Built automation:

‚úÖ Lead from the form is captured instantly
‚úÖ AI validates and cleans data
‚úÖ Automatically creates a card in Trello CRM with details and follow-up tasks
‚úÖ Email notification sent instantly

üîß Stack: n8n workflow + Webhook + Trello API + Email automation
list.result: Leads instantly appear in Trello with full info. Zero manual work, instant notifications.
list.resultDesc: Business processes leads faster than competitors.

list.problem: Traders and crypto teams spend hours reading news and generating digests for Telegram.
list.solutionText: Built AI automation based on CryptoPanic News Analyzer: every hour it takes news from CryptoPanic, analyzes via GPT (sentiment, forecast, insights), generates an image and publishes a ready digest to Telegram via n8n.
list.result: Fully automatic Crypto Digest every hour. Includes market sentiment, top news, forecast, risk metrics.
list.resultDesc: Frees up the team for real trades, not copy-paste.
